=== Case Studies ===

  * *Best Bid Ask* Merging quotes from different market and providing best quote to client and calculating simple profit and loss. Checkout the [EventPlus example].

  * *Option Valuations* Compute complex financial parameters dependent on multiple moving parameters in a consistent manner. Check out the [http://event-plus.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/examples/OptionValuation/ example] integrated with [http://www.jquantlib.org/ JQuantlib].

  * *Basket/ETF Price calculation* Computes basket price in real time.

  * *Decomposition* Decompose the basket and computes individual components.

  * *Barrier Processing* Detects [http://www.investopedia.com/terms/b/barrieroption.asp barrier] breaches for complex options.

  * *Margin Calculation* Calculates clients portfolio margin and notifies any additional margin requirement in real time.

  * *Portfolio Management* Manages portfolio and computes PNL real time.

  * *Ticker Plant* Run custom ticker plant for synthetic symbols.
